times_more: ${name1} has ${multiplier} times as many ${items} as ${name2}. If ${name2} has ${base} ${items}, how many more ${items} does ${name1} have than ${name2}?
With ${multiplier} times the number of ${items} that ${name2} has, ${name1} has quite a collection. ${name2} has ${base} ${items}. How many more does ${name1} have?
${name2} owns ${base} ${items}. ${name1} owns ${multiplier} times as many. What is the difference between their collections?
If ${name1} has ${multiplier} times as many ${items} as ${name2}, and ${name2} has ${base}, how many more ${items} does ${name1} have?
sum_and_difference: ${name1} and ${name2} have ${total} ${items} together. ${name1} has ${diff} more than ${name2}. How many ${items} does ${name1} have?
Between ${name1} and ${name2}, there are ${total} ${items} in total. If ${name1} has ${diff} more than ${name2}, how many does ${name1} have?
The combined collection of ${name1} and ${name2} is ${total} ${items}. ${name1}'s collection is ${diff} larger than ${name2}'s. How many ${items} does ${name1} have?
Together, ${name1} and ${name2} own ${total} ${items}. ${name1} has ${diff} more. What is ${name1}'s count?
more_less: ${name1} has ${more} more ${items} than ${name2}. ${name2} has ${base} ${items}. How many ${items} do they have together?
With ${more} more ${items} than ${name2}, ${name1} has quite a few. ${name2} has ${base}. What is their combined total?
${name2} owns ${base} ${items}. ${name1} owns ${more} more than ${name2}. How many ${items} do they have in total?
If ${name2} has ${base} ${items} and ${name1} has ${more} more, what is the total number of ${items} between them?
half_as_many: ${name1} has half as many ${items} as ${name2}. ${name2} has ${base} ${items}. How many more ${items} does ${name2} have than ${name1}?
With only half the ${items} that ${name2} has, ${name1} has fewer. ${name2} has ${base}. What is the difference?
${name2} owns ${base} ${items}. ${name1} owns half as many. How many more does ${name2} have?
If ${name1} has half of what ${name2} has, and ${name2} has ${base} ${items}, how many more ${items} does ${name2} have?
